title: Crash asking with status of dataset in dataset (not subdataset)
body:
```
❱ datalad --dbg status -d . 966975                                                                                       1 !
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/datalad", line 8, in <module>
    main()
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/cmdline/main.py", line 522, in main
    ret = cmdlineargs.func(cmdlineargs)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/interface/base.py", line 644, in call_from_parser
    ret = list(ret)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 421, in generator_func
    result_log_level, **_kwargs):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/interface/utils.py", line 516, in _process_results
    for res in results:
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/core/local/status.py", line 389, in __call__
    content_info_cache):
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/core/local/status.py", line 121, in _yield_status
    _cache=cache)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 3352, in diffstatus
    _cache)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 3388, in _diffstatus
    eval_file_type=eval_file_type)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 3129, in get_content_info
    submodules = [s.path for s in self.get_submodules()]
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 2587, in get_submodules
    xs = sorted(xs, key=key)
  File "/usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py", line 2578, in <genexpr>
    for p in xs)
KeyError: 'gitmodule_name'

> /usr/lib/python3/dist-packages/datalad/support/gitrepo.py(2578)<genexpr>()
-> for p in xs)
```

OTOH

```
❱ datalad status -d 966975                                                                                               2 !
❱ grep 966975 .gitmodules                                                                                                1 !
```

```
